name: The Yamnay Incident
description:
Take the reins of a starship just as the previous Captain has been relieved of command, and navigate the politics of a local territorial dispute. There are few options in front of you that don't present some risk. Balance the needs of your ship and your morals as you attempt to maintain the ideals of Utopia in a fraught situation.

(Not nearly close to content complete, very early version!)
